name: Encased Ember
relicLoreTooltips: It seems that throughout the existence of the Waxen Arches, everything has fallen victim to wax encasement. Not even the Ember of the Pyre has been spared, though I've collected any I've seen trapped to free them again later.

additionalTooltips.title: [ember] Ember
additionalTooltips.description: Spent to play cards from your hand.
